entities.name: high street
entities.description: The location where the Death Eaters were patrolling.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who are followers of Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: curfew
entities.description: A regulation that prohibits people from being out on the streets after a certain time.

entities.name: caterwauling charm
entities.description: A spell that is used to summon someone or something.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison for wizards and witches.

entities.name: dark marks
entities.description: A spell that is used to summon someone or something.

entities.name: pub
entities.description: The location where the conversation between the Death Eaters and the barman takes place.

entities.name: cat
entities.description: A pet that belongs to one of the characters in the story.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the Harry Potter series.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters were patrolling the High Street when they encountered someone breaking curfew.
The barman was accused of breaking curfew by one of the Death Eaters.
One of the Death Eaters asked if someone had used the Caterwauling Charm to summon someone or something.
The barman threatened that he would be sent to Azkaban if the Death Eaters pressed their Dark Marks and summoned Lord Voldemort.
One of the Death Eaters mentioned that they had pressed their Dark Marks, which would summon Lord Voldemort.
The barman owns the pub where the conversation takes place.
